name: Operation: Retrieval
description:
You are playing as John McDelver - Adventurer Extraordinaire.

You have been tasked by Unknown Forces to scour the depths of an Ancient Egyptian Tomb in the search of a piece of Ancient Technology known only as the "Golden Stick".

But beware, there are residents of the tomb that want the "Golden Stick" to stay where it is.

Made for the Weekly Game Jam - Week 70 - "Ancient Technology"

Music by https://mbg180.itch.io/ 

Press M twice to toggle music.
